column5: Everything will be ok, if you were able to accomplish such an awesome thing it means you are capable of getting through this and do it again; the world is a little crazy right now, try to focus on your health and positive thinking, it sucks but there are things that are out of our control sometimes. Congratulations on your accomplishment and i wish you a happy and successful future :)

Hello, i hope all the kind words and positive energy from the other users have been helpful; It must be hard to have to process so many things at once. i can only speak for myself and my experience but i hope i can help you somehow...try to prioritise your mental health and needs, sometimes we like to rush our grieving process and pretend everything is ok, specially if kids are involved, it can lead to crisis and disaster; talk to someone about your feelings, it‚Äôs ok if you are not ok; it‚Äôs corny but true, with time it will get better. Making distractions also works for me, i got new hobbies, read a lot, Netflix can be my best friend and i become a cooking goddess.

I have been on a mix of Valproic Acid and Quetiapine for months, i can say that it has worked extremely good for me, the hypomnia is extremely rare and subdued; i struggle a little bit more with depression but nothing unmanageable. I haven¬¥t experience any hair lose but i have notice some weight gain. Overall i find that i am more stable than i have been in years, no suicidal thoughts, no crazy shopping sprees.

Begone, evil forces! The power of friendship compels you!!! Sorry, i had to get that out of the way so it didn't stay on my head forever. I'm here if you need someone to talk to. I also have shitty memes to share.

Hi, i am sorry to hear you are not feeling well right now; i am not a gamer but i love harry potter, lord of the rings and all things fantasy. I like anime, and full disclosure...my guilty pleasure is the really embarrassing ‚Äúall guys want one girl‚Äù type of shoujo. i also know depression and if you need someone to talk to, share memes, or just get your mind off things, i am here.

I‚Äôm so sorry about what you are going through, I‚Äôm so socked to hear about the price of a simple MRI, where i am from it‚Äôs the equivalent of 180 dollars if you go get it privately or free if the doctor from the public hospital says you need it. Are you very far from the border? It might sound crazy to travel to another country for a test or treatment but it sounds like you really need to discard any other neurological issue.

Not pressured because i have no problem on doing it, it makes me feel guilty that i don‚Äôt want to naturally, i shouldn‚Äôt say ‚Äúi have no problem with it‚Äù i should want to, seek it, i enjoy it after we start but before that it feels like a chore, i feel defective and it makes me sad that i also make him feel bad.
Thank you, i will give it a try.

He doesn‚Äôt want to even talk about it anymore, he knows it stresses me out and told me i could take the initiative when i feel like it. He says that even asking for it is like pressuring me. Also he doesn‚Äôt want to be begging for sex, he says it makes him bad; ‚Äúi know it‚Äôs not correct but try to understand that it makes me feel undesired if i ask and you say no‚Äù. This situation stresses me even more because i have to decide to wait until I truly feel like it or lie again. But i also understand his position and this is the only thing he has asked of me in regards of my illness, he accepts all my ups and downs and it‚Äôs supportive even when i  know I‚Äôm acting crazy, he makes me feel validated and loved; so i feel like i should respect his request of not asking this of him.
I am just very frustrated with my body; maybe a change of medicine would help, i will ask my doctor.
I am very happy for you, finding an understanding partner that help us out of a bad episode it‚Äôs like finding gold ü•∞

I hope that if this situation doesn‚Äôt change soon we can get to a place like the one you are describing; i think the biggest issue here is not the lack of sex drive, it‚Äôs the fact that it wasn‚Äôt a problem before. We need to find a way to adapt and find a way to cope with it. 
Was it always like that with you? Was there a moment in your relationship that you changed?

I understand, two years ago it was the total opposite, i was having sex 4, 5 times a day, until my boyfriend at the time put his foot down and implemented a 3 sexy times per day policy. I was embarrassed and a little hurt, in retrospective i realise i was being very selfish and demanding.

It totally sucks.
Nope, they‚Äôre still curing and i am not a fan of lye on my food; ask me again in 3 weeks.
I wish my meds came in a cool container like those ones, mine just come in a box with a plastic sheet inside. I think if i ever get one i would feel like in a movie.
Nop, just soap
Thank you! Yes, i am feeling a little bit better...i also made lots of Christmas soaps.

I just started watching tutorials and decided make the easiest soap i could find, castille soap, it‚Äôs just olive oil and lye; added fragrance and a little color and i was hooked. This one is a combination of cold process soap and melt and pour soap. You can buy a melt and pour kit online if you want to try it, it‚Äôs really fun and easy.

Omg, thank you son much! I am amazed at the support I‚Äôve been receiving here. I am very grateful for your offer, i wouldn‚Äôt have expected it in a million years.
Thank you, i will try ‚ù§Ô∏è

Thank you, it‚Äôs cold process with melt and pour on top. I love making coffee soaps, the smell is amazing and it helps me wake up every morning.

I‚Äôm actually making Christmas soaps right now, so a lot of glitter and gold mica for me.
Thanks, i will definitely let you know.
Thank you, i am on the process of publishing things on etsy, i will try now that i am well.

You will get through this, i know it‚Äôs hard but try to focus on a task to numb your thoughts a little bit, it has always helped me to keep my mind occupied, it can be something as little as cooking, cleaning, reorganising, painting, writing or just watching a movie or series. All will pass and you will be fine; if you feel overwhelmed please call someone, your real friends will never be too busy to hear you out.
Great, if you ever come to Mexico give me a call!
Maybe i should make a cheesecake that looks like this, it‚Äôs totally doable! With colored caramelised sugar on top.
Yep, that‚Äôs me! Even if i feel extremely full i have the need to eat, it‚Äôs like if i don‚Äôt eat whatever i am fixated on the world would end.

It all started with pinterest, the body scrubs are not difficult at all, just mix sugar, coconut oil and essential oil and you can use food coloring or micca. For the soaps you can visit soapqueen.com or a similar site, they have amazing recipes and ideas.
I‚Äôm actually making Christmas soaps right now to give away as gifts, i will make boxes with peppermint sugar scrubs, soaps, face toners, face and beard oils and body brushes.

Same, i have a low pay but extremely secure job, i know i am very capable and there are so many things i can do but i have rejected opportunities out of fear of responsibility; i hate making plans or committing to something when i feel fine and then feeling overwhelmed when i am down.
Thank you! I am really happy I decided to post, i al always the silent observer, this community is so supportive ü•∞
That‚Äôs great! Sounds like a lot of fun, are you playing with special scents for the holidays?

Try it! I hope it helps you. I would love to sell them but i am hesitant, i get really apathetic sometimes and i just can‚Äôt be bothered. It would be awful on my part to have people waiting just because i don‚Äôt feel well.
Thanks, that was the vibe I was going for.
I could make the eatable version of it, i don‚Äôt think it would survive the time it takes to get to you though.
Lol no, but probably healthier than stuffing myself with desserts.

A little but i am glad i found something that gives me the same comfort but doesn‚Äôt make me feel guilty afterwards because of all the eating or all the food going to waste.

Thank you, if i ever find the courage to open an etsy store i would let you guys now.

I thought about it but i am a little afraid because there are days i don‚Äôt feel like doing anything, just the thought of waiting costumers stresses me out; but maybe it will be good to have something to forces me out of bed during the bad days.
